body_html:
I was able to succesfully build TF 1.4.1 for CUDA 7.5 with a few modifications as in mtngld@a6b7a05

I think it is a fairly small amount of changes required in order to support old CUDA versions, however I haven't fully tested this and there is probably more work required.

body:
I was able to succesfully build TF 1.4.1 for CUDA 7.5 with a few modifications as in https://github.com/mtngld/tensorflow/commit/a6b7a05331670870a635a1da30c5e7ad0754e526

I think it is a fairly small amount of changes required in order to support old CUDA versions, however I haven't fully tested this and there is probably more work required.
